channel.title: Fantasy on DW's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Fantasy on DW's Blog

item.title: Abstract
item.description: Tang Sect, the most famous martial arts sect of all. Tang San, a regular disciple of the Tang sect, is expelled from Tang sect because of trying to steal the top secret to fulfil his dream. With his ambition attained, he hands his legacy to the sect and throws himself from the fearsome “Hell’s Peak”. But he could have never imagined that this would reincarnate him in another world, one without magic, martial arts, and grudges.
